name: Pollen Storm
description: A swirl of pollen has taken over the battlefield. Any mons that aren't used to the stuff might get caught up on sneezing fits.
effect:
- Pokemon that aren't Grass, Poison or Bug-Type have a -3 penalty to Initiative.
- Powder Moves gain Never Fail. If a pokemon has Mycelium Might, they instead have increased Priority for the duration.
- Grass-Types restore 1 HP a turn during the duration.
- Abilities and moves that trigger from Sun also trigger from Pollen Storm.
